name: Play gram
description:
This game is a picross game made with playdate pulp.

It contains 60 simple 10x10 stages.

# How to Play

## Stage select scene

D-pad : Move

A Button : Select

## Puzzle scene

Crank : Switch mode
1. Play mode
2. BGM mode
3. Quit mode

- Play mode

D-pad : Move

A Button : Draw dot / Erase cell

B Button : Draw cross / Erase cell

- BGM mode

A Button / B Button : Toggle BGM

- Quit mode

D-pad / A Button / B Button : Open quit dialog
